file_content.text: The dark should help our escape.
Not as well as a massive explosion would have, but it will do. Koth, where are you?
Everyone will be busy now, and we'll be harder to see. Koth, do you read me?
Congratulations! You've made everything go completely insane!
Did something happen to you? Where are you?
Ran into sort of a maintenance issue.
How bad is it?
It's not great, but we're on top of it.
Give us... three minutes?
Hang tight. Hope you're not scared of the dark.
Give us... three minutes.
Should be fine, considering.
You do what you have to. We'll be waiting.
We'll be here, Koth.
That may be "too little, too late" with him.
Try not to waste any time.
Hurry up, Koth.
Wasn't planning on it.
Keep testing his patience, and we might just lose a valuable ally.
Some rescue party.
He's... not the greatest.
He's usually quite competent.
Inordinate stress can get the best of anyone. Give him a chance, you'll see.
Let's find a place to lie low and--
Not an option.
Three minutes. Right.
Three minutes. Okay.
Congratulations! They'll be digging bodies out of the rubble for weeks.
As rescue missions go, I've seen much better, Lana.
This is ridiculous, Lana.
Perhaps next time, you could get yourself captured somewhere more convenient?
